languages.text:
Вы подобрали новый посох!
Экипированные посохи даруют владельцу новые психосилы и вариации этих сил в виде героического акта и отчаянных мер. Владелец может использовать новые силы в бою по обычным правилам, пока держит посох в руках.
Также каждый посох обладает собственным уровнем силы, который вляет на мощность, дальность или иные параметры используемых психосил.

traits.locale_text:
Вы подобрали новый посох!
Экипированные посохи даруют владельцу новые психосилы и вариации этих сил в виде героического акта и отчаянных мер. Владелец может использовать новые силы в бою по обычным правилам, пока держит посох в руках.
Также каждый посох обладает собственным уровнем силы, который вляет на мощность, дальность или иные параметры используемых психосил.

languages.text:
You have found a new staff!
Psykers can use staves to channel new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and their variations in the form of {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. The staff's wielder follows the usual rules when using these new powers in combat.
Furthermore, each such staff has its own power level which affects the potency, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}, and other parameters of the associated psychic powers.
languages.original_text:
Вы подобрали новый посох!
Экипированные посохи даруют владельцу новые психосилы и вариации этих сил в виде героического акта и отчаянных мер. Владелец может использовать новые силы в бою по обычным правилам, пока держит посох в руках.
Также каждый посох обладает собственным уровнем силы, который вляет на мощность, дальность или иные параметры используемых психосил.

traits.locale_text:
You have found a new staff!
Psykers can use staves to channel new psychic powers and their variations in the form of a heroic act or a desperate measure. The staff's wielder follows the usual rules when using these new powers in combat.
Furthermore, each such staff has its own power level which affects the potency, range, and other parameters of the associated psychic abilities.

You have found a new staff!
Psykers can use staves to channel new psychic powers and their variations in the form of a heroic act or a desperate measure. The staff's wielder follows the usual rules when using these new powers in combat.
Furthermore, each such staff has its own power level which affects the potency, range, and other parameters of the associated psychic abilities.

You have found a new staff!
Psykers can use staves to channel new psychic powers and their variations in the form of heroic acts or desperate measures. The staff's wielder follows the usual rules when using these new powers in combat.
Furthermore, each such staff has its own power level which affects the potency, range, and other parameters of the associated psychic powers.

You have found a new staff!
Psykers can use staves to channel new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and their variations in the form of {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. The staff's wielder follows the usual rules when using these new powers in combat.
Furthermore, each such staff has its own power level which affects the potency, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}, and other parameters of the associated psychic powers.

You have found a new staff!
Psykers can use staves to channel new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and their variations in the form of {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. The staff's wielder follows the usual rules when using these new powers in combat.
Furthermore, each such staff has its own power level which affects the potency, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}, and other parameters of the associated psychic powers.

languages.text:
您发现了一根新的法杖！
灵能者可以使用法杖引导新的{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能能力{/g}，这种新的力量既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}能力使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}能力使用。法杖的装备者在战斗中使用新的力量时，同样遵循惯常的灵能力量规则。
此外，每根法杖都有各自的力量等级，会影响相关灵能能力的威力、{g|Encyclopedia:Range}范围{/g}与其他参数。
languages.original_text:
You have found a new staff!
Psykers can use staves to channel new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and their variations in the form of {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. The staff's wielder follows the usual rules when using these new powers in combat.
Furthermore, each such staff has its own power level which affects the potency, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}, and other parameters of the associated psychic powers.

traits.locale_text:
您发现了一根新的法杖！
灵能者可以使用法杖引导新的{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能力量{/g}，这种新的力量既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}能力使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}能力使用。法杖的装备者在战斗中使用新的力量时，同样遵循惯常的灵能力量规则。
此外，每根法杖都有各自的力量等级，会影响相关灵能力量的威力、{g|Encyclopedia:Range}范围{/g}与其他参数。

languages.text:
新たな杖を見つけた！
異能者は杖を使って、新たな{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}サイキック・パワー{/g}やそのバリエーションを、{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}といった形で使うことができる。杖の使用者がこの新しい力を戦闘で使う場合、通常のルールが適用される。
さらに、杖にはそれぞれパワーレベルがあり、関連するサイキック・パワーの効力、{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}、その他のパラメータに影響を与える。
languages.original_text:
You have found a new staff!
Psykers can use staves to channel new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and their variations in the form of {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. The staff's wielder follows the usual rules when using these new powers in combat.
Furthermore, each such staff has its own power level which affects the potency, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}, and other parameters of the associated psychic powers.

traits.locale_text:
新たな杖を見つけた！
異能者は杖を使って、新たな{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}やそのバリエーションを、{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}といった形で使うことができる。杖の使用者がこの新しい力を使う場合、通常のルールが適用される。
さらに、杖にはそれぞれパワーレベルがあり、関連する超能力の効力、{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}、その他のパラメータに影響を与える。

languages.text:
¡Has encontrado un báculo nuevo!
Los psíquicos puede usar báculos para activar {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g} nuevos o su equivalente como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actos heroicos{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medidas desesperadas{/g}. El personaje que lleve el bastón seguirá las reglas asociadas a estos poderes nuevos en combate.
Además, cada báculo tiene un nivel de poder determinado que afecta a la potencia, el {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance{/g} y otros parámetros de los poderes psíquicos asociados.
languages.original_text:
You have found a new staff!
Psykers can use staves to channel new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and their variations in the form of {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. The staff's wielder follows the usual rules when using these new powers in combat.
Furthermore, each such staff has its own power level which affects the potency, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}, and other parameters of the associated psychic powers.

traits.locale_text:
¡Has encontrado un báculo nuevo!
Los psíquicos puede usar báculos para activar {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g} nuevos o su equivalente como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actos heroicos{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medidas desesperadas{/g}. El personaje que lleve el bastón seguirá las reglas asociadas a estos poderes nuevos en combate.
Además, cada báculo tiene un nivel de poder determinado que afecta a la potencia, el {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance{/g} y otros parámetros de los poderes psíquicos asociados.

languages.text:
Du hast einen neuen Stab gefunden!
Psioniker können Stäbe benutzen, um neue {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionische Kräfte{/g} und ihre Variationen in Form von {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentaten{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstaten{/g} zu bündeln. Der Träger des Stabes befolgt die üblichen Regeln, wenn er diese neuen Kräfte im Kampf einsetzt.
Darüber hinaus hat jeder Stab eine eigene Kraftstufe, die sich auf die Stärke, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Reichweite{/g} und andere Parameter der damit verbundenen psionischen Kräfte auswirkt.
languages.original_text:
You have found a new staff!
Psykers can use staves to channel new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and their variations in the form of {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. The staff's wielder follows the usual rules when using these new powers in combat.
Furthermore, each such staff has its own power level which affects the potency, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}, and other parameters of the associated psychic powers.

traits.locale_text:
Du hast einen neuen Stab gefunden!
Psioniker können Stäbe benutzen, um neue {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionische Kräfte{/g} und ihre Variationen in Form von {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentaten{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstaten{/g} zu bündeln. Der Führer des Stabes befolgt die üblichen Regeln, wenn er diese neuen Kräfte im Kampf einsetzt.
Darüber hinaus hat jeder solche Stab seine eigene Kraftstufe, die sich auf die Stärke, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Reichweite{/g} und andere Parameter der damit verbundenen psionischen Kräfte auswirkt.

languages.text:
Vous avez trouvé un nouveau bâton !
Les psykers peuvent utiliser des bâtons pour canaliser de nouveaux {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} et leurs variations sous forme d'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actes héroïques{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesures désespérées{/g}. L'utilisateur du bâton suit les règles habituelles lorsqu'il a recours à ces nouveaux pouvoirs au combat.
En outre, chacun de ces bâtons possède son propre niveau de puissance qui affecte l'efficacité, la {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g} et d'autres paramètres des pouvoirs psychiques associés.
languages.original_text:
You have found a new staff!
Psykers can use staves to channel new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and their variations in the form of {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. The staff's wielder follows the usual rules when using these new powers in combat.
Furthermore, each such staff has its own power level which affects the potency, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}, and other parameters of the associated psychic powers.

traits.locale_text:
Vous avez trouvé un nouveau bâton !
Les psykers peuvent utiliser des bâtons pour canaliser les nouveaux {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} et leurs variations sous forme d'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actes héroïques{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesures désespérées{/g}. L'utilisateur du bâton suit les règles habituelles lorsqu'il a recours à ces nouveaux pouvoirs au combat.
En outre, chacun de ces bâtons possède son propre niveau de puissance qui affecte l'efficacité, la {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g} et d'autres paramètres des pouvoirs psychiques associés.

languages.text:
Yeni bir asa buldun!
Ruhsezerler, asalar aracılığıyla yeni {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}ruhsezi güçleri{/g} ve bu güçlerin {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlem{/g} biçimindeki varyasyonlarını kullanabilirler. Asayı kuşanan kişi, bu yeni güçleri çatışmada kullanırken her zamanki kurallara tabidir.
Buna ilaveten bu tür asaların ilgili ruhsezi güçlerinin tesir, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzil{/g} ve diğer parametrelerini etkileyen kendi güç seviyeleri de bulunur.
languages.original_text:
You have found a new staff!
Psykers can use staves to channel new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and their variations in the form of {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g}. The staff's wielder follows the usual rules when using these new powers in combat.
Furthermore, each such staff has its own power level which affects the potency, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}, and other parameters of the associated psychic powers.
